text: Nihsandeha yara abisbasa posana kare tara tadera dhanasampatti kharaca kare allahâ€Œra patha theke badha debara jan'ye. Tara eta kharaca karabe'i, tarapara eti habe tadera jan'ya manastapera karana, tarapara tadera parajita kara habe. Ara yara abisbasa posana kare tadera jahannamera dike ekatrita kara habe
